overview: When a strange man answers her call, Sunrise mind sanders to strange and erotic places. Is her roommate ing with the phone repairman? Is her roommate ing with her? Could a random call end in a random encounter? The possibilities are as endless as they are cordless, in ChiChi LaRue's great new comedy Ring Me Up!
tagline: Is It The Wrong Number If It's The Right Person?
title: Ring Me Up
